item.title: Classified loans down 3.45pc, profits up 2.52pc
item.description: Bangladesh House Building Finance Corporation (BHBFC) recorded a notable turnaround in the 2024-25 fiscal year as its classified loans declined to a historic low of 3.45 per cent, while profits rose by 2.52 per cent. This reflected improved operational efficiency and prudent financial management.
